prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_AF01",
  "name": "Family AirFryer Weeknight Wins",
  "core_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat",
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "SemiPrepared"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Air Fryer Nugget Wraps & Fries",
  "description": "Crispy chicken nugget wraps with fresh greens and cherry tomatoes, served with hot fries. Quick, kid-friendly, and fully air-fryer ready.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat air fryer to 200°C (390°F) for 3 minutes.",
    "Halve cherry tomatoes.",
    "Lay out salad greens and tortilla wraps on a board.",
    "Set out aioli and ketchup for serving.",
    "If using a microwave to warm wraps later, keep a damp paper towel ready."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Add chicken nuggets to the air fryer basket in a single layer.",
    "Add fries to a second rack or cook after the nuggets if space is limited.",
    "Air fry nuggets for 8–10 minutes, shaking halfway, until crisp and heated through.",
    "Air fry fries for 10–12 minutes, shaking halfway, until golden and hot.",
    "Warm tortilla wraps: microwave 15–20 seconds covered with a damp paper towel, or place in the air fryer for 30 seconds.",
    "Assemble wraps: spread aioli on each wrap, add salad greens and cherry tomatoes, then 4–5 nuggets (slice if preferred). Fold and press lightly.",
    "Serve wraps with fries and ketchup on the side."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken nuggets",
      "quantity": "16–20 pieces",
      "preparation": "frozen or chilled, ready to cook"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "fries",
      "quantity": "600 g",
      "preparation": "frozen"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tortilla wraps",
      "quantity": "4 large",
      "preparation": "for warming"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salad greens",
      "quantity": "4 cups",
      "preparation": "rinsed and dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "aioli",
      "quantity": "4 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "for spreading"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "ketchup",
      "quantity": "4 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "for dipping"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "Mexican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "NoHeat"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "AirFryer",
      "Microwave"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "ReadyMealPreferred",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        ```json
        {
  "product_matches": [
        ```
